dkeep.logic

Class GameHandler.OptionalArgs

  • java.lang.Object
    • dkeep.logic.GameHandler.OptionalArgs
  • Enclosing class:
    GameHandler

    public static class GameHandler.OptionalArgs
extends java.lang.Object
    Inner class to encapsulate optional arguments for extra functionality: updates a status label's text and disables/enables buttons appropriately.
